title: Ideal Goggles
summary: Privacy-first photo search powered by AI — everything runs locally on your computer.
description: Desktop app for searching your photo library using natural language, face recognition, and OCR. Built with React, Python/FastAPI, and Electron. All AI processing happens on your machine — zero cloud uploads.

title: PayPal Webhooks
summary: Closed a critical product gap with near real-time analytics and resilient delivery system.
description: Designed and implemented a webhook notification system that addressed merchant needs for reliable event delivery. Built analytics pipeline for real-time monitoring and spam prevention.

title: BLE Migration
summary: Migrated asset tracking from RFID to Bluetooth Low Energy, dramatically reducing costs.
description: Led the technical migration from expensive RFID hardware to cost-effective BLE beacons. Implemented WebSocket-based triangulation for real-time location tracking.

title: Storage Optimization
summary: Optimized database performance and improved architectural documentation.
description: Analyzed and tuned PostgreSQL queries and indexing strategies. Created comprehensive C4 architecture diagrams to align technical and business stakeholders.

title: Port Advancer
summary: CLI tool for secure port forwarding in restricted corporate networks.
description: Created a user-friendly command-line tool that enables employees to easily perform port forwarding and reverse proxying for secure internet access within restricted networks.

title: Skill Seekers
summary: Automatically convert any documentation website into a Claude AI skill.
description: Contribution to an automated tool that transforms documentation websites into production-ready Claude skills. Features universal scraping, PDF support, MCP integration, and AI-powered enhancement.

title: Utils Commons
summary: Java utility library inspired by Apache Commons IO.
description: Collection of utilities for String, Number, Date, Set, List, BLOB, and Zip operations. Focused on developer productivity and clean APIs.

title: Vue Embed Gist
summary: Contribution to popular Vue component for embedding GitHub Gists.
description: Contributed improvements to an open-source package that averages 270 weekly downloads on npm.

title: Mydia
summary: Self-hosted media management platform with unified movies & TV tracking.
description: Modern media companion built with Phoenix LiveView. Features automated downloads, multi-user system with SSO, real-time calendar, and native indexer support. Combines the best of Radarr/Sonarr in one unified app.
